name: WorldCurrenciesGame
0:
”Alexa, open currencies game”
”start the game”
”give me a hint”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: currencies game
des:
1. About the game

it is a World Currencies Game where users can play a quiz game and face World Currencies questions. 
Here, we provide the world with various currency questions that help users know about the world's various currencies and check their knowledge about currencies.
It is also available for Alexa display-supported devices.
Now you also can ask for a hint. In the hint, you will listen to a fact or other related sentence which helps you to guess the answer.
You also can set a reminder as well.
Now answer with answer option like (A, B, C, D).

2. Features:-

interactive sounds available for better engagement of customers.
users also can enjoy this game on Alexa display-supported devices.
Collections of wanted and most popular questions which definitely interact you to play one or more times.
Reminder added.
Hints added.
Listen to a fact after every question.
Improved visual experience added.
GUI card (Alexa app)

3. How to play.

 just say, Alexa, currencies game ( for starting the game) 
 you also can follow the example phrase as well. 
for the reminder, you can say, ( reminder, set a reminder, etc.)
for a hint ( give me a hint, hint, etc.)

4. Score guide ( for every level )

 correct answer = [in game =10 points]
 wrong or don't know = 0 points
 
5. Reach to us
 you have any queries or suggestions about the game, you can reach us at info@akskills.com

Thanks in advance for giving support to us.

Note: give reminder permission in your Alexa app. Follow the Alexa app for editing reminders after a successful reminder created.
Save the user progress, which helps to start the game from where they left off.
This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
